pr_title: participant manager web app common changes

timeline.bodyText: Please don't use this naming convention for files. Use dashes instead of ., it's just Angular types (directive, component, service, etc) that have this convention. The linter doesn't support checking this.
timeline.author: nikklassen
nikklassen

timeline.bodyText: Typo, and don't include Enum in the type. Should be Permission.
timeline.author: nikklassen
nikklassen

timeline.message: code review comments has been resolved
